name: Harbinger (itch) (Thom_jake-theOnlyJake)
description:
The year is 2140, twenty years after modern society had been entirely destroyed by a series of supernatural disasters. The rest of humanity, numbering very few, has retreated into the mountains of Slovakia, seemingly safe to live out the rest of their lives. However, a strong winter has slowly encroached and chances of survival seem much slimmer.

Split into five equal factions, each player takes control of one and must gather  resources, trade with others, craft materials to help provide shelter. Your overall goal: survive sixty days until the end of winter. It is not that simple, however. Everything happens in this world for a reason; connecting with the same spirits to which ushered the apocalypse can hint to a more horrific fate than what was once understood.
